name: Math Test (highlee)
description:
This is a Maths testing game, it helps to train your brain and improve your mental arithmetic. The game is really simple, all you have to do is to select '√‘’ or '×' for each question.

This game is suitable for all ages, it helps children to improve their mathematics skill, and also helps adults to train their brain.

Game Rules:

◆No Calculator

◆Ready question carefully, select '√' or 'x'

◆There are 50 questions on each year

◆Each question worths 2 marks

◆There are different time limitation on each year (but this could be changed)

◆Enjoy the game :)
